original_title: Man dies after being attacked with sharp weapons
original_body_lines: A 39-year-old, assaulted by a group of unidentified individuals wielding sharp weapons, has succumbed to injuries.
The deceased had been attacked in front of his house in Mattakkuliya last night, according to the police.
He was rushed to the Colombo National Hospital with critical injuries, however, he was later pronounced dead.
The perpetrators have been identified and Mattakkuliya police are conducting further investigations into the incident.
